Generation IX.Scarlet: This Pokémon is a glutton, but it's bad at getting food. It teams up with a Tatsugiri to catch prey.
Generation IX.Violet: It treats Tatsugiri like its boss and follows it loyally. Though powerful, Dondozo is apparently not very smart.

Generation IX.Scarlet: North Province: Casseroya Lake Tera Raid Battles ( 5★ , 6★ )
Generation IX.Violet: North Province: Casseroya Lake Tera Raid Battles ( 5★ , 6★ )
